forall x y d : Z, Zis_gcd x y d -> exists a b : Z, x = Z.mul d a /\ y = Z.mul d b /\ rel_prime a b

Related definitions and lemmas:
rel_prime = fun a b : Z => Zis_gcd a b 1 : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments rel_prime (_ _)%Z_scope
Inductive Zis_gcd (a b g : Z) : Prop := Zis_gcd_intro : (g | a) -> (g | b) -> (forall x : Z, (x | a) -> (x | b) -> (x | g)) -> Zis_gcd a b g Arguments Zis_gcd (_ _ _)%Z_scope Arguments Zis_gcd_intro (_ _ _)%Z_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Inductive Z : Set := Z0 : Z | Zpos : positive -> Z | Zneg : positive -> Z Arguments Zpos _%positive_scope Arguments Zneg _%positive_scope
not_rel_prime1 : forall x y : Z, ~ rel_prime x y -> exists d : Z, Zis_gcd x y d /\ d <> 1 /\ d <> -1
not_rel_prime2 : forall x y d : Z, (d | x) -> (d | y) -> d <> 1 -> d <> -1 -> ~ rel_prime x y
rel_prime_cross_prod : forall a b c d : Z, rel_prime a b -> rel_prime c d -> b > 0 -> d > 0 -> a * d = b * c -> a = c /\ b = d
Zis_gcd_unique : forall a b c d : Z, Zis_gcd a b c -> Zis_gcd a b d -> c = d \/ c = - d
Zis_gcd_uniqueness_apart_sign : forall a b d d' : Z, Zis_gcd a b d -> Zis_gcd a b d' -> d = d' \/ d = - d'
Zis_gcd_sym : forall a b d : Z, Zis_gcd a b d -> Zis_gcd b a d
Zis_gcd_bezout : forall a b d : Z, Zis_gcd a b d -> Bezout a b d
Zis_gcd_minus : forall a b d : Z, Zis_gcd a (- b) d -> Zis_gcd b a d
Zgcd_spec : forall x y : Z, {z : Z | Zis_gcd x y z /\ 0 <= z}
Euclid_intro : forall a b u v d : Z, u * a + v * b = d -> Zis_gcd a b d -> Euclid a b
rel_prime_sym : forall x y : Z, rel_prime x y -> rel_prime y x
Zis_gcd_opp : forall a b d : Z, Zis_gcd a b d -> Zis_gcd b a (- d)
Zis_gcd_for_euclid : forall a b d q : Z, Zis_gcd b (a - q * b) d -> Zis_gcd a b d
Bezout_intro : forall a b d u v : Z, u * a + v * b = d -> Bezout a b d
Z_lt_neq = fun (x y : Z) (H : x < y) => Z.neq_sym x y (Z.neq_sym y x (Z.neq_sym x y (Z.lt_neq x y H))) : forall x y : Z, x < y -> y <> x Arguments Z_lt_neq {x y}%Z_scope
Zis_gcd_for_euclid2 : forall b d q r : Z, Zis_gcd r b d -> Zis_gcd b (b * q + r) d
Bezout_ind : forall (a b d : Z) (P : Prop), (forall u v : Z, u * a + v * b = d -> P) -> Bezout a b d -> P
OMEGA6 : forall x y z : Z, 0 <= x -> y = 0 -> 0 <= x + y * z
Z.divide = fun x y : Z => exists z : Z, y = z * x : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments Z.divide (_ _)%Z_scope
Zis_gcd_mult : forall a b c d : Z, Zis_gcd a b d -> Zis_gcd (c * a) (c * b) (c * d)
euclid_rec : forall a b v3 : Z, 0 <= v3 -> forall u1 u2 u3 v1 v2 : Z, u1 * a + u2 * b = u3 -> v1 * a + v2 * b = v3 -> (forall d : Z, Zis_gcd u3 v3 d -> Zis_gcd a b d) -> Euclid a b
Inductive Euclid (a b : Z) : Set := Euclid_intro : forall u v d : Z, u * a + v * b = d -> Zis_gcd a b d -> Euclid a b Arguments Euclid (_ _)%Z_scope Arguments Euclid_intro (_ _ _ _ _)%Z_scope
Inductive Bezout (a b d : Z) : Prop := Bezout_intro : forall u v : Z, u * a + v * b = d -> Bezout a b d Arguments Bezout (_ _ _)%Z_scope Arguments Bezout_intro (_ _ _ _ _)%Z_scope
rel_prime_dec : forall x y : Z, {rel_prime x y} + {~ rel_prime x y}
Zlt_0_rec : forall P : Z -> Type, (forall x : Z, (forall y : Z, 0 <= y < x -> P y) -> 0 <= x -> P x) -> forall x : Z, 0 <= x -> P x
Euclid_rec : forall (a b : Z) (P : Euclid a b -> Set), (forall (u v d : Z) (e : u * a + v * b = d) (z : Zis_gcd a b d), P (Euclid_intro a b u v d e z)) -> forall e : Euclid a b, P e
Euclid_sind : forall (a b : Z) (P : Euclid a b -> SProp), (forall (u v d : Z) (e : u * a + v * b = d) (z : Zis_gcd a b d), P (Euclid_intro a b u v d e z)) -> forall e : Euclid a b, P e
Euclid_ind : forall (a b : Z) (P : Euclid a b -> Prop), (forall (u v d : Z) (e : u * a + v * b = d) (z : Zis_gcd a b d), P (Euclid_intro a b u v d e z)) -> forall e : Euclid a b, P e
Euclid_rect : forall (a b : Z) (P : Euclid a b -> Type), (forall (u v d : Z) (e : u * a + v * b = d) (z : Zis_gcd a b d), P (Euclid_intro a b u v d e z)) -> forall e : Euclid a b, P e
